snippet: President Obama told Hispanic lawmakers that he was eager to see whether the nation’s existing immigration laws could be applied in a more humane way.
abstract: Pres Obama tells Hispanic lawmakers that deportations of illegal immigrants should be more humane, and to make that happen, he has ordered review of his administration's enforcement efforts; cites concern for families.
lead_paragraph: President Obama told Hispanic lawmakers that he was eager to see whether the nation’s existing immigration laws could be applied in a more humane way.

headline.main: Obama, Citing a Concern for Families, Orders a Review of Deportations
headline.print_headline: Obama, Citing a Concern for Families, Orders a Review of Deportations
